name: Omnie Solutions
tag_list: enterprise-application-development, mobile-application-development, resources-augmentation, web-development-company, ecommerce-application-application-development-company, sharepoint-application-development, biztalk, powerbuilder
overview:
Omnie Solutions (I) Pvt. Ltd. founded in 2002, is an enterprise web application development company. We are group of well experienced professionals who utilize their innovative ideas to meet client expectations. Our precision in rational thinking, diverse technical expertise and unique creativity builds sustainable and flexible business solutions. Omnie Solutions aim is to innovate around all edges and corners in order to make solutions simpler and turn the customer experience into understandable and actionable results.

Omnie Solutions is a certified gold partner of Oracle, Microsoft for software development and the largest ASL partner for IBM in North America. Omnie Solutions creates cross platform enterprise mobile applications based on the IBM Worklight platform for its clients. We provide solutions for enterprise application development, enterprise mobility solutions and facilitate ecommerce solutions. We have specialized professionals for .Net, Java, Siebel, Power Builder, SharePoint, PHP, Flex, and IBM WebSphere Portal Sever.

Our Technology:-

We work on different Technology:

Microsoft Technology(SharePoint 2010, .net, power builder Biztalk, Window Azures etc) IBM Web Sphere(Sterling Commerce) Oracle Technology PHP Java Java Script Data Base Migration
